stories.title: The Succession Crisis
stories.logline: When the king falls ill, Prince Aldric must navigate deadly court politics while a rebel thief uncovers a conspiracy that could either save or destroy the kingdom.
stories.theme: The burden of power and the cost of inaction

scenes.time: Night, one week before the king's collapse
scenes.purpose: Establish the world and introduce Aldric's internal conflict
scenes.summary: Prince Aldric walks the empty halls of the Crimson Palace, unable to sleep. He encounters Lady Morel, who hints at political storms ahead.
key_dialogue: Aldric: 'The crown feels heavier each day, though I've never worn it.'
Morel: 'Some burdens are carried before they're given, Your Grace.'
scenes.action: Aldric paces. Morel appears from shadows. They speak in hushed tones near a window overlooking the city.

scenes.purpose: Introduce Kira and establish the parallel world beneath the palace
scenes.summary: Kira receives a mysterious job offer at The Drowning Pool tavernÃ¢â‚¬â€steal something from the Crimson Palace. The pay is too good to refuse.
key_dialogue: Client: 'One item. Small enough to hide in your palm. Worth enough to disappear forever.'
Kira: 'Nothing's ever that simple. What aren't you telling me?'
scenes.action: Kira sits alone in shadows. A hooded figure approaches. Coin slides across the table. Kira hesitates, then takes it.

shots.description: Establishing shot of the Crimson Palace at night. Towers silhouetted against a cloudy moon. One window glows with candlelight.
shots.action: Static exterior. Light flickers in window.
shots.lighting_notes: Moonlight through clouds. Single warm window. Otherwise cold blue tones.

shots.description: Follow Aldric as he walks through dark palace corridors. Shadows dance from his candle. His face shows exhaustion and worry.
shots.action: Aldric walks slowly, one hand trailing along the stone wall. He pauses at a painting of his father.
shots.lighting_notes: Warm candlelight on face, deep shadows otherwise. Flickering creates movement.

shots.description: Close on Aldric's hand as he unconsciously touches his signet ring, the symbol of his unwanted inheritance.
shots.action: Fingers turn the ring. Metal glints in candlelight.
shots.lighting_notes: Tight lighting on hands and ring. Background dark.
